# Projectiles


```template
effects.starField.startScreenEffect()
let mySprite = sprites.create(img`
    . . . . . . . 9 9 . . . . . . .
    . . . . . . 9 . . 9 . . . . . .
    . . . . . . 9 . . 9 . . . . . .

    9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9
`, SpriteKind.Player)
controller.moveSprite(mySprite)
mySprite.setFlag(SpriteFlag.StayInScreen, true)
```

## Introduction @unplugged

![Releasing projectiles](/static/skillmap/space/projectiles.gif "Here, enemy ship. Would you like to borrow an asteroid?")

## Th√™m s·ª± ki·ªán x·∫£y ra khi b·∫•m n√∫t

## H·ªçc v·ªÅ v·∫≠n t·ªëc @unplugged

Ch√∫ng ta g·ªçi ƒë√≥ l√† [__*v·∫≠n t·ªëc*__](#veloc "ƒë·ªô nhanh c√πng v·ªõi h∆∞·ªõng").

- Thay ƒë·ªïi gi√° tr·ªã ƒë·ªÉ ch√∫ng bay sang tr√°i hay sang ph·∫£i b·∫±ng c√°ch thay ƒë·ªïi [__*vx*__](#whatX "thay ƒë·ªïi t·ªëc ƒë·ªô t·ª´ tr√°i sang ph·∫£i")

## T·∫°o m·ªôt vi√™n ƒë·∫°n

Ch∆°i v·ªõi c√°c gi√° tr·ªã __vx__ v√† __vy__ c·ªßa vi√™n ƒë·∫°n cho ƒë·∫øn khi ch√∫ng bay th·∫≥ng l√™n v·ªõi t·ªëc ƒë·ªô ·ªïn ƒë·ªãnh.

## T√πy ch·ªânh hi·ªáu ·ª©ng

d∆∞·ªõi c√πng c·ªßa kh·ªëi l·ªõn ``||controller:on [A] button pressed ||``.  

üî≤ Thay ƒë·ªïi gi√° tr·ªã ``||variables:mySprite||`` to ``||variables:projectile||`` n·∫øu b·∫°n
mu·ªën c√°c hi·ªáu ·ª©ng tr√™n vi√™n ƒë·∫°n c·ªßa b·∫°n thay v√¨ tr√™n chi·∫øc t√†u c·ªßa b·∫°n.

üî≤ Th·ª≠ c√°c t√πy ch·ªçn kh√°c t·ª´ menu th·∫£ xu·ªëng ``||sprites:[spray]||`` v√† ch·ªçn c√°i b·∫°n th√≠ch nh·∫•t!

**M·∫πo Nh·ªè**: B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th√™m m·ªôt kh·ªëi code ``||sprites:[mySprite] start [spray] effect||`` kh√°c ƒë·ªÉ th√™m m·ªôt hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ri√™ng cho t√†u v≈© tr·ª• c·ªßa b·∫°n.

    let projectile = sprites.createProjectileFromSprite(img`
